titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to work with vehicle manufacturers, suppliers, and other interested parties to advance the technology developed by the Driver Alcohol Detection System for Safety Research Program, and for other purposes.
Reduce Impaired Driving for Everyone Act of 2019

RIDE Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
